class_notes:
(Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)
(This online class will meet on Thursdays only. The remaining class material will be delivered asynchronously.)


Writing Lives - In this class, students will practice writing about their own lives, read life writing by famous authors, and explore what it means to live a writerly life. We will investigate questions of identity as we refine our writing skills and practices. Projects include narrative writing, textual analysis, and multimodal compositions. Permission only from Jane O'Connor Director of the English Language Learning Program (ELLP).
course_description: Prerequisites: English 101 or 181 and written permission of instructor. Practical introductions to various kinds of media and professional writing. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
